TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeIdentifiers extends System.Object

summary.span: 维护相关代码实体或类型映射的一组名称，这些名称是 .NET Framework 的 XML 序列化基础结构生成的。

span.span: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表标识了使用的工具和类 ：The following list identifies tools and classes that use the : - [Web 服务描述语言工具 ( # A0) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)或 类，同时从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类。The [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - [Xml 架构定义工具 ( # A0) ](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe)工具，同时从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档生成类。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe) tool while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. - 类 ，从通过特性标识为 Web 服务的类创建对象时 。The class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services via the attribute. 使用前面提到的工具或类，而不是直接使用类。Instead of using the class directly, use the aforementioned tools or classes. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联属性。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes. 可以使用实例来维护以下列表中任何项的名称，具体取决于其作用域：Depending on its scope, a instance can be used to maintain the names of any of the items in the following list: - 类型、方法或字段。Types, methods, or fields. - 与 WSDL 输入和输出消息相对应的方法的参数和返回值。The parameters and return value of a method corresponding to WSDL input and output messages. - 可以序列化到 WSDL 文档的实例中的对象。Objects within a instance that can be serialized to a WSDL document. 通常，类用于避免在特定范围内的代码实体之间发生命名冲突，包括与包含实体的名称发生冲突。Typically, the class is used to avoid naming collisions between code entities within a particular scope, including collisions with the name of a containing entity.

param.span: 如果标识符区分大小写，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if identifiers are case sensitive; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并确定代码标识符是否区分大小写。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and determines whether code identifiers are case sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string identifier, object? value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Add (identifier As String, value As Object)
public: void Add(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);
public void Add (string identifier, object value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用于对代码实体进行索引的名称。

span.span: A name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 代码实体或类型映射信息。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 将命名的代码实体或类型映射添加到 实例的范围中。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 方法不同， 方法不会阻止命名冲突。Unlike the method, the method does not prevent naming collisions. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddReserved(string identifier) cil managed

param.name: identifier
param.span: 将在 实例的范围中不可用的名称。

span.span: A name that will not be available within the instance's scope.

summary.span: 防止在 实例的范围中使用指定的名称。

span.span: Prevents a specified name from being used within the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留名称可以属于包含代码实体（例如，还必须为其生成成员名称的类型）。A reserved name can belong to a containing code entity, such as a type for which member names must also be generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AddUnique (string identifier, object? value);
.method public hidebysig instance string AddUnique(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Function AddUnique (identifier As String, value As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ AddUnique(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);
public string AddUnique (string identifier, object value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用于对代码实体进行索引的候选名称。

span.span: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 代码实体或类型映射信息。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 将命名的代码实体或类型映射添加到 实例的范围中，确保名称在该范围内是唯一的。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.

returns.span: 标识符参数值；如果存在名称冲突，则为修改后的字符串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标识符参数值在 实例的范围内不唯一，则会生成一个新的唯一字符串，并将其用于位置。If the identifier parameter value is not unique within the instance's scope, a new, unique string is generated and used in its place. 新字符串通过追加到输入名称来生成。The new string is generated by appending to the input name. 如果原始名称以前传递到 、 或 方法，或者它是由之前的方法调用生成的，则该名称不是唯一的 。The original name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by a previous call to the method. 在每种情况下，如果新标识符不唯一，则首先将它传递给 方法以创建新的唯一标识符。In each case, if the new identifier is not unique, it is first passed to the method to create a new unique identifier. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从 实例的范围中移除所有代码实体或类型映射，包括它们的名称。

span.span: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会删除通过方法添加的保留名称 。Reserved names, as added through the method, are not removed. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsInUse(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function IsInUse (identifier As String) As Boolean

param.name: identifier
param.span: 要检查是否已在 实例的范围中使用的名称。

span.span: The name to check for use within the instance's scope.

summary.span: 确定指定名称是否已在 实例的范围中使用。

span.span: Determines whether a specified name is already being used within the instance's scope.

returns.span: 如果名称已使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the name is already in use; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入名称以前传递到 、 或 方法，或者它是由方法生成的，则输入名称不是唯一的 。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeRightCase(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeRightCase (identifier As String) As String

span.span: The name to possibly modify.

summary.span: 根据 属性的值修改名称，以确保输入的大小写正确。

span.span: Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the property.

returns.span: 与输入标识符相同（或改变了首字母的大小写）的字符串。

span.span: A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性的值 为 `true` ，并且输入的第一个字符是字母，则它将变为小写（如有必要）。If the value of the property is `true` and the first character of the input is a letter, it is made lowercase, if necessary. 如果的值 为，则 `false` Pascal 大小写有效并且第一个字符（如果是字母）为大写字母（如有必要）。If the value of the is `false`, Pascal case is in effect and the first character, if a letter, is capitalized, if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeUnique(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeUnique (identifier As String) As String

param.name: identifier
param.span: 要修改的名称（如果不唯一）。

span.span: The name to modify if it is not already unique.

summary.span: 确定输入名称是否与 实例范围中的其他名称冲突，如果是，则生成修改的字符串。

span.span: Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.

returns.span: 标识符参数值；如果存在名称冲突，则为修改后的字符串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入名称以前传递到 、 或 方法，或者它是由方法生成的，则输入名称不是唯一的 。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果该名称不是唯一的，则通过将追加到原始字符串来生成新的字符串。If the name is not unique, a new string is generated by appending to the original string. 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization).

span.span: Removes the input name from the instance's reserved names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，请使用关联的属性，而不是创建类的实例 。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示实例是否使用 camel 大小写。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.

value.span: 如果指示实例使用 camel 大小写，则为 ；如果指示实例使用 Pascal 大小写，则为 。

span.span: to indicate that the instance uses camel case; to indicate that the instance uses Pascal case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 camel 大小写时，如果标识符的第一个字符是字母，则它必须是小写。With camel case, if the first character of an identifier is a letter, it must be lowercase. 在 Pascal 情况下，如果第一个字符是字母，则必须为大写字母。With Pascal case, if the first character is a letter, it must be uppercase.
